DOC.brief_title: BIIB033 Single Ascending Dose Study Healthy Volunteer Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: BIIB033 investigational product develop promote remyelination subject multiple sclerosis ( MS ) . This healthy volunteer study evaluate safety tolerability single dose BIIB033 .
DOC.criteria: Must good health BMI 1830kg/m2 Contraception require least 6 month study drug administration History clinically significant disease lab value Females childbearing potential Contraindication brain MRI and/or lumbar puncture Treatment prescription medication within 28 day prior study entry Treatment overthecounter product , include herbal and/or alternative health preparation procedure within 14 day prior study entry Regular use tobacco product within 3 month prior study entry
